entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21 with temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon. High minus 21 with temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
